article_title: How Entrepreneurs Can Speak Out About The Cost Of Regulation

article_metadata.author: Clyde Wayne Crews Jr.

og.description: When federal bureaucrats in Washington released the Report to Congress on the Benefits and Costs of Federal Regulations for fiscal year 2013, their hope was for the public to believe that regulations cost just $2-$2.5 billion while bestowing benefits of up to $67 billion. The better takeaway is that a mere [...]
